card.name: Allay
card.property: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Angelic Blessing
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the warrior who can admit mortal weakness will be bolstered by immortal strength.

card.name: Cataclysm
card.property: Each player chooses from among the permanents they control an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a land, then sacrifices the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Weatherlight dragged the Predator behind it, the cradle hauling the casket.

card.name: Charging Paladin
card.property: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hope shall be the blade that severs our bonds."

card.name: Convalescence
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 10 or less life, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Selenia had hurt Mirri terribly, but injuries of the flesh could be treated. The wounds she had torn in Crovax's soul would never close.

card.name: Exalted Dragon
card.property: Flying Exalted Dragon can't attack unless you sacrifice a land. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If dragons excel at anything more than vanity, it is greed.

card.name: High Ground
card.property: Each creature you control can block an additional creature each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In war, as in society, position is everything.

card.name: Keeper of the Light
card.property: {W}, {T}: Choose target opponent who had more life than you did as you activated this ability. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Kor Chant
card.property: All damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control by a source of your choice is dealt to another target creature instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The true treasure no thief can touch.

card.name: Limited Resources
card.property: When Limited Resources enters the battlefield, each player chooses five lands they control and sacrifices the rest. Players can't play lands as long as ten or more lands are on the battlefield.

card.name: Oath of Lieges
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who controls more lands than they do and is their opponent. The first player may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle their library.

card.name: Paladin en-Vec
card.property: First strike, protection from black and from red (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike. It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black or red.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our belief shall be the lance that pierces Volrath's heart."

card.name: Peace of Mind
card.property: {W}, Discard a card: You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Three are the paths of the soul: One out—roam across the plain, One back—dwell with tribe and tent, One in—turn an enemy's hate.

card.name: Pegasus Stampede
card.property: Buyback—Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Create a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying.

card.name: Penance
card.property: Put a card from your hand on top of your library: The next time a black or red source of your choice would deal damage this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Reaping the Rewards
card.property: Buyback—Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) You gain 2 life.

card.name: Reconnaissance
card.property: {0}: Remove target attacking creature you control from combat and untap it.

card.name: Shackles
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. {W}: Return Shackles to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shackles of gold are still shackles.

card.name: Shield Mate
card.property: Sacrifice Shield Mate: Target creature gets +0/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They bear weightier burdens than the shields they carry.

card.name: Soltari Visionary
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Whenever Soltari Visionary deals damage to a player, destroy target enchantment that player controls.

card.name: Soul Warden
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Count carefully the souls and see that none are lost. —Vec teaching

card.name: Standing Troops
card.property: Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The less you have, the harder you fight for it.

card.name: Treasure Hunter
card.property: When Treasure Hunter enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What separates junk from treasure is imagination." —Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

card.name: Wall of Nets
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) At end of combat, exile all creatures blocked by Wall of Nets. When Wall of Nets leaves the battlefield, return all cards exiled with Wall of Nets to the battlefield under their owners' control.

card.name: Welkin Hawk
card.property: Flying When Welkin Hawk dies, you may search your library for a card named Welkin Hawk, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Zealots en-Dal
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if all nonland permanents you control are white, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Great chains shall free our warriors." —Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Aether Tide
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X creature cards. Return X target creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The tide of magic brought them here. Now it would take them home.

card.name: Cunning
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. When enchanted creature attacks or blocks, sacrifice Cunning at the beginning of the next cleanup step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ". . . Dry-walkers die We feed on sweet flesh . . . ." —Rootwater Saga

card.name: Curiosity
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All Mirri wanted to do was rest, but she couldn't ignore a nagging suspicion as she followed Crovax's skulking form.

card.name: Dominating Licid
Ephemeron
card.property: Flying Discard a card: Return Ephemeron to its owner's hand.

card.name: Equilibrium
card.property: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Rath, there are only so many souls to go around.

card.name: Ertai, Wizard Adept
Fade Away
card.property: For each creature, its controller sacrifices a permanent unless they pay {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Consider the fable of the greedy herder. As her flock grew, so did her weariness; she slept, and the sheep wandered off." —Karn, silver golem

card.name: Forbid
card.property: Buyback—Discard two cards. (You may discard two cards in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Counter target spell.

card.name: Keeper of the Mind
card.property: {U}, {T}: Choose target opponent who had at least two more cards in hand than you did as you activated this ability. Draw a card.

card.name: Killer Whale
card.property: {U}: Killer Whale gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hunger is like the sea: deep, endless, and unforgiving.

card.name: Mana Breach
card.property: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player returns a land they control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wizard had it all—until she tried to use it.

card.name: Merfolk Looter
card.property: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the depths of Rootwater, salvage and sewage differ only in texture.

card.name: Mind Over Matter
card.property: Discard a card: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lyna turned to the figure beside her. "They're gone. What now?" "As ever," said Urza, "we wait."

card.name: Mirozel
card.property: Flying When Mirozel becomes the target of a spell or ability, return Mirozel to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mirozels are the only stars in Rath's opaque skies.

card.name: Oath of Scholars
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who has more cards in hand than they do and is their opponent. The first player may discard their hand and draw three cards.

card.name: Robe of Mirrors
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Rootwater Mystic
card.property: {1} {U}: Look at the top card of target player's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Read the roots tell the tale Future forms in waving weeds Higher than truth is hope." —Rootwater Saga

card.name: School of Piranha
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice School of Piranha unless you pay {1}{U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some schools aren't worth getting into.

card.name: Scrivener
card.property: When Scrivener enters the battlefield, you may return target instant card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "History is a potent weapon." —Karn, silver golem

card.name: Thalakos Drifters
card.property: Discard a card: Thalakos Drifters gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They drift in and out of shadow and ever on toward madness.

card.name: Thalakos Scout
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Discard a card: Return Thalakos Scout to its owner's hand.

card.name: Theft of Dreams
card.property: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Volrath stole everything there was of me."—Takara

card.name: Treasure Trove

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Karn and Hanna stood over the recovered Legacy artifacts like loving parents over sleeping children.

card.name: Wayward Soul
card.property: Flying {U}: Put Wayward Soul on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "no home no heart no hope"—Stronghold graffito

card.name: Whiptongue Frog
card.property: {U}: Whiptongue Frog gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Carnophage
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, tap Carnophage unless you pay 1 life.

card.name: Cat Burglar
card.property: {2} {B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The il-Kor no longer roam the open plains, but they are still hunters.

card.name: Culling the Weak
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Add {B}{B}{B}{B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blood of the weak shall be the ink with which we scribe great Yawgmoth's glorious name." —Stronghold architect, journal

card.name: Cursed Flesh
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A farewell to arms . . . and feet . . . and legs . . . .

card.name: Dauthi Cutthroat
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) {1}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature with shadow.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In their twisted logic, to empty the shadow world is to escape it.

card.name: Dauthi Jackal
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) {B}{B}, Sacrifice Dauthi Jackal: Destroy target blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All Dauthi are jackals, regardless of breed." —Lyna, Soltari emissary

card.name: Dauthi Warlord
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Dauthi Warlord's power is equal to the number of creatures with shadow on the battlefield.

card.name: Death's Duet
card.property: Return two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life has always been a dance. It is only fitting that death sing the tune.

card.name: Entropic Specter
card.property: Flying As Entropic Specter enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. Entropic Specter's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in the chosen player's hand. Whenever Entropic Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

card.name: Fugue
card.property: Target player discards three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My ship . . . ," Sisay mumbled. "Intact," Gerrard reassured her, "which is more than I can say for you, my friend." Sisay laughed despite the pain.

card.name: Grollub
card.property: Whenever Grollub is dealt damage, each opponent gains that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mogglings caught in a misdeed often blame the grollub. Even though the creature is usually innocent, no taskmaster can resist an excuse to beat it.

card.name: Hatred
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life. Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will flay the skin from your flesh and the flesh from your bones and scrape your bones dry. And still you will not have suffered enough." —Greven il-Vec, to Gerrard

card.name: Keeper of the Dead
card.property: {B}, {T}: Choose target opponent who had at least two fewer creature cards in their graveyard than you did as you activated this ability. Destroy target nonblack creature that player controls.

card.name: Mind Maggots
card.property: When Mind Maggots enters the battlefield, discard any number of creature cards. For each card discarded this way, put two +1/+1 counters on Mind Maggots.

card.name: Nausea
card.property: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Any mogg will tell you there's nothing more nauseating than the smell of cute.

card.name: Necrologia
card.property: Cast this spell only during your end step. As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life. Draw X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My enemies' death yields threefold benefit: removal, reuse, and research." —Volrath

card.name: Oath of Ghouls
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player whose graveyard has fewer creature cards in it than their graveyard does and is their opponent. The first player may return a creature card from their graveyard to their hand.

card.name: Pit Spawn
card.property: First strike At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Pit Spawn unless you pay {B}{B}. Whenever Pit Spawn deals damage to a creature, exile that creature.

card.name: Plaguebearer
Recurring Nightmare
card.property: Sacrifice a creature, Return Recurring Nightmare to its owner's hand: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am confined by sleep and defined by nightmare." —Crovax

card.name: Scare Tactics
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fear rules those weak enough to accept it." —Greven il-Vec

card.name: Slaughter
card.property: Buyback—Pay 4 life. (You may pay 4 life in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Spike Cannibal
card.property: Spike Cannibal enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When Spike Cannibal enters the battlefield, move all +1/+1 counters from all creatures onto it.

card.name: Thrull Surgeon
card.property: {1} {B}, Sacrifice Thrull Surgeon: Look at target player's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just take a little off the top."

card.name: Vampire Hounds
card.property: Discard a creature card: Vampire Hounds gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hounds' barks are a horrifying chorus of screams, moans, and whispers.

card.name: Volrath's Dungeon
card.property: Pay 5 life: Destroy Volrath's Dungeon. Any player may activate this ability but only during their turn. Discard a card: Target player puts a card from their hand on top of their library. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Anarchist
card.property: When Anarchist enters the battlefield, you may return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll take that. You won't need it when the revolution comes."

card.name: Cinder Crawler
card.property: {R}: Cinder Crawler gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if Cinder Crawler is blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The crawler doesn't care what gets in its way. It pushes everything into the boiling muck and waits for the meal to cook.

card.name: Dizzying Gaze
card.property: Enchant creature you control {R}: Enchanted creature deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When I cut down my angel I only started my fall." —Crovax

card.name: Fighting Chance
card.property: For each blocking creature, flip a coin. If you win the flip, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by that creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A stroke of luck can smite an army.

card.name: Flowstone Flood
card.property: Buyback—Pay 3 life, Discard a card at random. (You may pay 3 life and discard a card at random in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Destroy target land.

card.name: Furnace Brood
card.property: {R}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Furnace air crackles with magmatic cackles.

card.name: Keeper of the Flame
card.property: {R}, {T}: Choose target opponent who had more life than you did as you activated this ability. Keeper of the Flame deals 2 damage to that player.

card.name: Mage il-Vec
card.property: {T}, Discard a card at random: Mage il-Vec deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Living below a flowstone foundry produces a disproportionate number of fire mages among the il.

card.name: Maniacal Rage
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only by sacrificing any semblance of defense could Gerrard best Greven.

card.name: Mogg Assassin
card.property: {T}: You choose target creature an opponent controls, and that opponent chooses target creature. Flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy the creature you chose. If you lose the flip, destroy the creature your opponent chose.

card.name: Monstrous Hound
card.property: Monstrous Hound can't attack unless you control more lands than defending player. Monstrous Hound can't block unless you control more lands than attacking player.

card.name: Oath of Mages
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who has more life than they do and is their opponent. The first player may have Oath of Mages deal 1 damage to the second player.

card.name: Ogre Shaman
card.property: {2}, Discard a card at random: Ogre Shaman deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ogre shamans must be bright enough to learn their invocations and dim enough to use them.

card.name: Onslaught
card.property: Whenever you cast a creature spell, tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The last thing to go through the mogg's mind was its teeth.

card.name: Pandemonium
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, that creature's controller may have it deal damage equal to its power to any target of their choice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If we cannot live proudly, we die so!" —Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

card.name: Paroxysm
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player reveals the top card of their library. If that card is a land card, destroy that creature. Otherwise, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Price of Progress
card.property: Price of Progress deals damage to each player equal to twice the number of nonbasic lands that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Man versus nature is not a fair fight.

card.name: Raging Goblin
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Volrath has bred them to fear only him. Are they charging into battle, or merely fleeing his wrath?

card.name: Ravenous Baboons
card.property: When Ravenous Baboons enters the battlefield, destroy target nonbasic land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Build something and the baboons will tear it down. Leave the pieces lying and they will scatter them.

card.name: Reckless Ogre
card.property: Whenever Reckless Ogre attacks alone, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no such thing as a regiment of ogres.

card.name: Sabertooth Wyvern
card.property: Flying, first strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most creatures grow out of their baby teeth, but sabertooth wyverns grow into theirs.

card.name: Scalding Salamander
card.property: Whenever Scalding Salamander attacks, you may have it deal 1 damage to each creature without flying defending player controls.

card.name: Seismic Assault
card.property: Discard a land card: Seismic Assault deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The flowstone seemed for a moment to assume Greven's rage—it lunged like a wild beast at the Weatherlight.

card.name: Shattering Pulse
card.property: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Sonic Burst
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card at random. Sonic Burst deals 4 damage to any target.

card.name: Spellshock
card.property: Whenever a player casts a spell, Spellshock deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A snap of fingers, a snap of teeth.

card.name: Avenging Druid
card.property: Whenever Avenging Druid deals damage to an opponent, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. If you do, put that card onto the battlefield and put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

card.name: Bequeathal
card.property: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, you draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "On my death, I give you this treasure: the knowledge that life is hard, yet too soon past." —Dal funeral rite

card.name: Cartographer
card.property: When Cartographer enters the battlefield, you may return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: How do you map a world when the land moves beneath your feet?

card.name: Crashing Boars
card.property: Whenever Crashing Boars attacks, defending player chooses an untapped creature they control. That creature blocks Crashing Boars this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bores ruin a party. Boars are party to ruin.

card.name: Elven Palisade
card.property: Sacrifice a Forest: Target attacking creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Volrath is not the only one who can shape this world to serve him." —Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

card.name: Elvish Berserker
card.property: Whenever Elvish Berserker becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their fury scatters enemies like a pile of dry leaves.

card.name: Jackalope Herd
card.property: When you cast a spell, return Jackalope Herd to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's little more demeaning than getting your butt kicked by a bunch of bunnies.

card.name: Keeper of the Beasts
card.property: {G}, {T}: Choose target opponent who controlled more creatures than you did as you activated this ability. Create a 2/2 green Beast creature token.

card.name: Manabond
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, you may reveal your hand and put all land cards from it onto the battlefield. If you do, discard your hand.

card.name: Mirri, Cat Warrior
card.property: First strike, forestwalk, vigilance (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike, it can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest, and attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

card.name: Oath of Druids
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who controls more creatures than they do and is their opponent. The first player may reveal cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card. If the first player does, that player puts that card onto the battlefield and all other cards revealed this way into their graveyard.

card.name: Plated Rootwalla
card.property: {2} {G}: Plated Rootwalla gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: " . . . And the third little boar built his house out of rootwalla plates . . . ." —Skyshroud children's story

card.name: Predatory Hunger
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever an opponent casts a creature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.

card.name: Pygmy Troll
card.property: Whenever Pygmy Troll becomes blocked by a creature, Pygmy Troll gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {G}: Regenerate Pygmy Troll.

card.name: Rabid Wolverines
card.property: Whenever Rabid Wolverines becomes blocked by a creature, Rabid Wolverines gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Reclaim
card.property: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wise pay as much attention to what they throw away as to what they keep.

card.name: Resuscitate
card.property: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "{1}: Regenerate this creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is the art of convincing someone to live." —Orim, Samite healer

card.name: Rootwater Alligator
card.property: Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate Rootwater Alligator.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Subduing and skinning an alligator is the first rite of maturity adolescent merfolk must pass.

card.name: Skyshroud Elite
card.property: Skyshroud Elite gets +1/+2 as long as an opponent controls a nonbasic land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Civilization is a conspiracy to disguise the mutilation of nature." —Skyshroud elite creed

card.name: Skyshroud War Beast
card.property: Trample As Skyshroud War Beast enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. Skyshroud War Beast's power and toughness are each equal to the number of nonbasic lands the chosen player controls.

card.name: Song of Serenity
card.property: Creatures that are enchanted can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Heartwood brings peace in great symphonies where dryads conduct the trees through every note.

card.name: Spike Hatcher
card.property: Spike Hatcher enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Hatcher: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Hatcher: Regenerate Spike Hatcher.

card.name: Spike Rogue
card.property: Spike Rogue enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Rogue: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on Spike Rogue.

card.name: Spike Weaver
card.property: Spike Weaver enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Weaver: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Weaver: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Survival of the Fittest
card.property: {G}, Discard a creature card: Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Wood Elves
card.property: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Secure in the embrace of wood, they want no part of Eladamri's war.

card.name: Coat of Arms
card.property: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hup, two, three, four, Dunno how to count no more." —Mogg march

card.name: Erratic Portal
card.property: {1}, {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In Barrin's name!" cried Lyna as Hanna's sword passed through her, "Ertai sends word that the portal is open—but not for long!"

card.name: Medicine Bag
card.property: {1}, {T}, Discard a card: Regenerate target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My medicine bag and I have treated countless wounds and illnesses. But never have I seen so many made so sick for so long. We will never eat Squee's cooking again." —Orim, journal

card.name: Memory Crystal
card.property: Buyback costs cost {2} less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hues of recollection flicker like facets of a gem.

card.name: Mindless Automaton
card.property: Mindless Automaton enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mindless Automaton. Remove two +1/+1 counters from Mindless Automaton: Draw a card.

card.name: Null Brooch
card.property: {2}, {T}, Discard your hand: Counter target noncreature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Give away everything so others have nothing. —Brooch inscription

card.name: Skyshaper
card.property: Sacrifice Skyshaper: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It'll get us to the portal, but I can't guarantee what it'll do to the ship." —Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

card.name: Spellbook
card.property: You have no maximum hand size.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everything the wise woman learned she wrote in a book, and when the pages were black with ink, she took white ink and began again." —Karn, silver golem

card.name: Sphere of Resistance
card.property: Spells cost {1} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A sphere pushes equally in all directions.

card.name: Thopter Squadron
card.property: Flying Thopter Squadron enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Thopter Squadron: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. {1}, Sacrifice another Thopter: Put a +1/+1 counter on Thopter Squadron. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Transmogrifying Licid
card.property: {1}, {T}: Transmogrifying Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {1} to end this effect. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and is an artifact in addition to its other types.

card.name: Workhorse
card.property: Workhorse enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Workhorse: Add {C}.

card.name: City of Traitors
card.property: When you play another land, sacrifice City of Traitors. {T}: Add {C}{C}.
